page.title: 09ELEMS FARM INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: ELMS FARM INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.- THIS MODERN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE OCCUPIES MORE THAN HALF OF BLOCK ONE. IT IS STILL DEVELOPING AND EVERY MONTH MORE SITES ARE TAKEN TO PROVIDE MANUFACTURING,WAREHOUSE, OFFICE AND WORKSHOP SPACE FOR ALL KINDS OF COMPANIES INCLUDING MULTI-NATIONAL, NATIONAL AND SMALL PARTNERSHIPS.MANY PARENTS WORK THERE. 1. MY DAD AND HIS PARTNER MOVED TO THEIR NEW WORKSHOP 2 YEARS AGO FROM A BARN IN RENHOLD.THEY REPAIR CARS AND ANSWER CALLS TO BREAKDOWNS ON ROADS AND MOTORWAYS. 2.MY DAD WORKS FOR A MULTI-NATIONAL COMPANY SUPPLYING CABLES AND MAKES AND TESTS WEIGHING MACHINES. MY DAD WORKS FOR A CAR ACCESSORY SUPPLIER,SUPPLYING AOUT 700 TRUCK WHEELS A DAY.
